wind_up_time.description: Time until the weapon fully winds up.

wind_down_time.description: Time until the weapon fully winds down.

rpm_anim_id.description: [string]What the animation variable is for rotating the barrel.

rpm_multiplier.description: The RPM spin is decided by the weapon RPM, this would act as a multiplier on top.

wind_up_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you start winding up.

wind_down_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you start winding down.

wind_up_anim.description: [string]Animation to play when you start winding up.

wind_down_anim.description: [string]Animation to play when you start winding down.
